lyrics.text:
Ifi ke mou ifi,
‘A e me’a lea,
Ke ongo mālie
Ki he angahala;
‘I he ngaahi pule’anga
‘O māmani kotoa pē.

Faka’ilo atu
Ki he tō ki lalo,
Mo e kau pōpula
‘A e ongo lelei;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.

‘A e angahala
Ke mou tafoki mai,
Ki homou ‘Otua
Pea mou mo’ui;
He kuo hokosia mai
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.

He ko hotau ‘Eiki
Mo e Tauhi lahi,
Na’e ‘atu ia
‘A e fu’u totongi,
‘I he’etau angahia
Mo māmani kotoa pē.

‘A e kau mamahi
Mou fiemālie,
Pea mo e tangi
Ke mou fiefia;
He kuo hokosia mai,
‘A e ta’u ‘o e Siupeli.
